Text:
How fast the blight spreads into the water (%/tick).
Each game tick (0.6s), a part of water is made into badwater.
For example, at default 0.1%, your reservoir without any new fresh water in
will become 100% contaminated after 1000 ticks / 600s (about one and a half game day).
Limit the range your land get moisture when badrain is active.
The maximum moisture range when badrain is active.
Contaminate the land every now and then when badrain is active.
How long the land is contaminated (days) when badrain is active.
How long the land is clear of contamination (days) when badrain is active.

The Skyblight Strength setting unit is now % instead of â€°.
You can also set it to smaller number by using decimal.
The default value is set to 0.1% (5 times slower than previous default settings).
Hazardous weather: All water get contaminated over time. Does not affect waters in storage (Tanks).

Hazardous weather: Same effect as Skyblight and selectable additional effects:
- Limit Moisture Range: your land can only carry moisture to a much smaller range.
- Contaminate Land: the land will be contaminated every now and then.
